's Big Blog( mjsbigblog.com) says Idol is at a crossroads. "With falling ratings and failing music sales and Simon Cowell leaving, something has to happen to rejuvenate the franchise," she says. I could see Idol going on for many years, but if they're going to remain culturally relevant, they have to have a really big year this year. Mike Pence in Washington. That night, Mike Pence , his wife, Karen, and their children reached the final decision that he would not seek the White House-- at least not in 2012. the move, accusing Eric Schmidt of compromising the company's values to in order to grow its business. In particular, the group blasted Eric Schmidt for his handling of recent privacy concerns. Eric Schmidt used to claim that Google put its money where its values were, said Comsumer Watchdog Inside Google director John M. Simpson . "In fact while Eric Schmidt had his hand on the helm, values were changed to go where the money was." News of the changes

Page told the AP: My goal is to run Google at the pace and with the soul and passion of a startup. I think I will have time to do that given the way we have split up our responsibilities. coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called "adult supervision" for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,

he decided to step aside.In announcing the move Thursday, Eric Schmidt said that the company no longer needed his "adult supervision" and that Page, 38, was ready to run the world's leading internet company. We have been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, said Eric Schmidt in announcing the decision.
